column4: Jordan, Soundray, Ubotu  Thanks for your help. The script ran fine from the terminal and I now have access to 30G instead of 2G. It was easy to follow the instructions
I am really happy. I almost feel like crying. I came from Amiga (land) and used to love it till my old system failed and I went Windows/Intel.
I feel almost like I am coming home again and the madness is ending
